articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Seems there are quite some issues to solve to improve web3 onboarding 🥲

Vicentia Pius 🥉🥷: While we have seen millions of people transition from #web2 to #web3 over the years, we cannot deny that a good number of these people had to deal with some limitations while adopting web3 technology. These limitations have been the reason why a billions of people and companies
articles.title: Seems there are quite some issues to solve to improve web3 onboarding 🥲

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Solana or Ethereum?
What do you think? 🤔

Ini Abasi Ekanem: 🔷🔹Who's the better L1 network: Solana or Ethereum?🔹🔷
The comparison between #Solana and #Ethereum, and their potential coexistence, hinges on the specific use cases and changing dynamics of the blockchain space.
Read the full article here👇🏻
https://open.substack.com/pub/iniabasiekanem/p/whos-the-better-l1-network-solana?r=4g7qb&utm_campaign=post&utm_medium=web&showWelcome=true
🧵
articles.title: Solana or Ethereum? What do you think? 🤔

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Save gas fees with these awesome tips from @LeomOfThings 🤩

leomofthings.eth | .lens: #30daysoftext Day 24 powered by @developer_dao 
Tips on Saving Gas Fees🤑💸
"gas fees" is a common term commonly used in the context of blockchain and cryptocurrency transactions. It is a fee required to successfully conduct a transaction or execute a contract on the blockchain.
articles.title: Save gas fees with these awesome tips from @LeomOfThings 🤩

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Wanna incentivize your users? 
Ini will teach you how!

Ini Abasi Ekanem: 🔷🔹Token Incentives🔹🔷
Most blockchain projects and protocols focus on community building as this is key to product adoption, given that web3 is still novel.
To boost community participation and product adoption, incentivizing the community via ''token incentives'' is key.
🧵
articles.title: Wanna incentivize your users? Ini will teach you how!

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Re @iaminiekanem knows something about @POKTnetwork 🤩

Ini Abasi Ekanem: 📌 @POKTnetwork THE RPC BASE LAYER
Pokt Network provides Web3 Infrastructure with high uptime, cost-effective access, and low latency.
Having it's own wallet, bridge, and explorer, Pokt network allows web3 protocols to access key features.
How?
articles.title: Re @iaminiekanem knows something about @POKTnetwork 🤩
